website_summaries.verdict: Your best option if you're in the market for an extra-large umbrella to shield you against sun, wind and rain.
pros: Steel frame holds up well against strong winds
cons: There have been a few complaints of the umbrella's ribs breaking

website_summaries.verdict: Versatile, quality umbrella with a fan following.
pros: As well as a wind diverting double canopy and fiberglass ribs and tips, this is also exceptionally water resistant, quick drying, and mold resistant
Comes in a range of sizes, from 54" to 68", which is big enough for 3 people
cons: These are huge umbrellas and the larger size can be cumbersome, especially when getting in and out of vehicles

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!!’
customer_reviews.text: Used umbrella 5 times, had it for 3 months. On the 6th use I opened the umbrella and one of the inner spikes snapped, contacted the manufacturer about the “Life time warranty” and was told I had the umbrella more than 60 days and they would give me a discount on a replacement. Product and customer service a puce of crap. Have already advised my friends not to buy G4 products. My co worker was lookin at a gym bag they make after hearing my story he changed his mind. Nothing like word of mouth testimony G4!
customer_reviews.author: Bglove1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for wedding
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in anticipation of rain on our wedding day. So happy I did! It was rainy and windy! The umbrella worked wonderfully and looked great in the pictures too! It was big enough to cover the both of us, didn't leak, and no problem with the wind. My husband and I were grateful we had this. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and takes HTV well
customer_reviews.text: A great umbrella! Very large and sturdy, great quality. This umbrella opens easily, quickly, and smoothly with the push of a button. It closes smoothly and feels very strong. The handle is comfortable to hold and the material is very nice quality. I monogrammed this with heat transfer vinyl on a press and it came out perfect as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is so good! I love this thing. The feel and build is far better than expected. It’s feel like somthing worth at least four times as much. Took it to Alaska and it survived a storm NOAA weather system didn’t. The weather so bad our flights got delayed three days. I used this to shoot video under and am super glad it still feels new.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Noble

customer_reviews.title: Awesome umbrella! I Use it for my daughter and me while waiting for the school bus on rainy mornings
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I purchased this umbrella because of the size. I use it to cover both my daughter and me on rainy days while waiting for the school bus. The size is perfect. We don't have to squeeze together to be covered and avoid runoff from the sides of the umbrella. The size gives us plenty of space to stand comfortably. We probably have enough room underneath for a 3rd person to also be covered. I plan on buying a second one just like it to keep in my car, when I have the money. I highly recommend this umbrella to anyone looking for an large one.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is awesome . I am 6' tall and on the heavy side and with most umbrellas being 58ins. - 62ins. wide I always got wet on the back. But with this 68in. wide umbrella it works for me . I would recommend this item to any person .
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, sturdy and keeps me completely dry!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for anybody looking to stay dry in rain and for a sturdy umbrella. My previous umbrella was smaller and would get tossed inside out in heavy wind. This umbrella does not do that, ever, and that crazy Chicago weather can really get bad. It also encompasses all of me and my work bag, so all of you will stay dry. Your bag or backside will remain completely dry. Has a nice little strap to carry over your body/shoulder and it's easy to fold up and unfold and has two velcro strands to make it nice and compact. Some might think a smaller umbrella will suffice, but no, trust me....this one is what you need!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Broke in wind almost immediately.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella busted after one strong gust. Either my umbrella was an anomaly, or these are not built or designed sturdy enough. See picture. This was on the third use.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael J.

customer_reviews.title: While I initially thought this was a great umbrella today it proved otherwise
customer_reviews.text: While I initially thought this was a great umbrella today it proved otherwise. After 4 or 5 uses the wind won today. I was holding it with 2 hands but a gust of wind flipped it open and really tore it to shreds. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality umbrella. I was not expecting it to be so huge! I considered returning, but it is really sturdy and offers good wind resistance and a case that has a nice shoulder strap, so I decided to keep it. I bought it because I live in a very hot climate and do a lot of walking, it works great but it's definitely not something you can put into a bag. Perfect purchase as long as you don't mind carrying an extra item when not in use. Slips right back into the case with little effort (though I have only used it in dry conditions). The automatic button release works great so far, much easier than manual umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Science

customer_reviews.title: They had fun and both stay in dry in this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It’s very tall and big! I bought it for my father and my son so that they can go out in a raining day. And, indeed, it’s big enough for both of them ! They had fun and both stay in dry in this umbrella! Super recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Ning Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service saved the day!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I gave this product 1 star because I was only able to use the umbrella 3 times before it completely broke on me because the open button was not opening at all. HOWEVER, customer service really kind to reach out to me within two days of me writing my original review and gave me the option of wither receiving a refund or sending me a new a umbrella. Their customer service made me give this umbrella another shot. I tried it a couple times and love how it functions with no issues!!! This type of customer service saves the business at the end of the day!
customer_reviews.author: Milad I.

customer_reviews.title: Broke After First Use
customer_reviews.text: First I bought this as a Christmas present. I bought it in late October and the return period ended in late November. So the umbrella didn’t get used until after Christmas. First time it was used the plastic end broke off (at the top of the umbrella), and little pieces went everywhere. Now I’m in the market for yet another umbrella and I can’t return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Klaw

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Pro Very light Con: poor construction and material, easily breaks. Con: I had other sun UPF umbrellas but I don't think this one is, possible inaccurate product information. Had it less than 30 days
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: Pictures looked good, however...
customer_reviews.text: Pictures looked good, however umbrella internal poles snapped as I attempted to open it for the first time during a rain storm. I rarely write reviews and spend thousands on Amazon. I do NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MN prime

customer_reviews.title: Not what it advertised
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this umbrella. It looks great and felt sturdy. We loved it...until we used it in a storm and it broke!!! We paid more money for a durable umbrella that claimed to hold up in wind and it did not do what it advertised. He bought this in March and it broke in July so it didn’t even last long. We are very disappointed because we really like this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a prison. It’s like a college campus with. Barb wired perimeter. My post often require me to walk the perimeter, which is quite windy, and stand outside on moves. I wanted an umbrella that is advertised to withstand high winds. I’ve used this umbrella 4 or 5 times now and it’s never turned inside out on me, yet. It’s very lightweight, which I never have much consideration to when purchasing umbrellas. Lightweight is awesome. The grey is a nice matte look. The foam grip handle is comfortable. I’ll update this post if this umbrella malfunctions or breaks anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month x2
customer_reviews.text: Update: The replacement broke in windy conditions. Very dissatisfied with the product as this unit doesnt seem to be sturdy. I may seek a replacement elsewhere. I would like to get my money back since the unit broke. I was so mad when it broke in the rain I left it where it broke. Finished the last mile of my walk soaking wet. Update Dec 2017: The seller replaced my umbrella and the new one is working well so far. I had this product for less than a month and it broke. It no longer closes (plastic broke). I never mishandled the umbrella, always kept it in its sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice good quality umbrella. I have not tested it against the wind yet, but it kept me nice and dry during the windless, VERY rainy soccer games last Saturday. I am hoping it stands up against wind as it indicates as my other one didn't.
customer_reviews.author: GrammyTami

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but poor execution
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and shape of this umbrella. We live in Southern CA, and it doesn't rain much, but it is so nice to have a good umbrella available. Unfortunately, this isn't it. I purchased this a few months ago, and we just had our first substantial rainfall since it arrive. One of the support arms (plastic construction) completely cracked off during normal operation in it's first use. We are now outside the return window, so it looks like I am stuck with a floppy umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Kline

customer_reviews.title: This Umbrella Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella leaked during a heavy summer rain here in Michigan. I first used a cheaper umbrella during a Surprise “Down Pour” and it leaked immediately. So, I went inside to retrieve this more expensive umbrella, expecting it to perform flawlessly. But after a few minutes of being in a Heavy down pour, this umbrella started to leak at the top. Needles to say I am greatly disappointed with the quality of this umbrella. There was so much Hype in advertising that I felt this umbrella should never leak under normal usage. I DO NOT recommend this product, it isn’t waterproof 😢
customer_reviews.author: Rubin Bass

customer_reviews.title: BIG umbrella for little price
customer_reviews.text: Update, next day: tried to use first time this morning and realized it is broken. The top can't lock into handle due to plastic piece broken. See pics. If thr velcro is closed it seems to stay in place but going to havd to replace and and hope it's a fluke. -------------------------------------------------- Just received. It is exactly what I was looking for. It seems like a quality, sturdy umbrella. It opens effortlessly with one push of the button. This umbrella is big but isn't too heavy. Could easily share with a friend that needs shelter from the elements. Very happy with this item for price.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Good size-Disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the umbrella for 3 months now and only used is 3, maybe 4 times. One of the rivets has come out as you can see in pic. Update 7JAN19: main pole bent from gust of wind. Now totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: March 13th 2018 in Boston we had Nor'easter wind I took this umbrella out and it could do a pretty great job against wind
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one for stormy days. This umbrella sustained Nor'easter wind. March 13th 2018 in Boston we had Nor'easter wind I took this umbrella out and it could do a pretty great job against wind, even at some point I use it as a sailing, to pull me ahead just playing on the snow. If you are looking for a great umbrella and strong and big enough to cover everything for two persons, I definitely suggest this umbrella. I hope you enjoy it. Trust it, and be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the customer service provided by G4Free. I bought this umbrella, & the first time I used it in the wind, it broke. I contacted the company, & they sent me a brand new umbrella right away. I didn't even have to send the broken one back to them, just some pictures, so they can work on the structure so it won't continue to break. I feel assured that if I have any problem with this new umbrella, I will be taken care of again.
customer_reviews.author: Empty67

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is OK, but still a hassle. Item quality is poor.
customer_reviews.text: Revising my rating from one star to two stars. The first umbrella I received snapped in half the first time I opened it (see pic), leaving my hands full of shards of whatever this thing is made of. The seller failed to respond to my first message but did get back to me after my second. I received a replacement, but it's also shoddy. The fixtures that keep the canopy attached to the ends of the ribs keep popping off. Three stars for customer service; one star for quality. Average: two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta Kurmo

customer_reviews.title: Well Made & Good Price
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is nicely constructed and it opens and closes smoothly. I plan to use it for short walks in light rain and it appears to be well suited to that role. Will it stand up to torrential rain and wind gusts of 40 mph? I don't know and I hope to avoid finding out. Over the past 60 years I've destroyed many umbrellas out in high winds and I finally learned my lesson: stay indoors until the storm is over.
customer_reviews.author: alanhouston

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 uses.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella came and was perfect for both sun and rain protection. I used it approx. 6 times throughout my son's soccer season last year and this fall. It broke just about a week ago. I put it up and noticed some of the under wires had popped off the top connection. I then tried to close it and it was impossible. I finally was able to gather it all together and tied the cover around it. Extremely disappointed for the price and that I had used it so little.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally Poorly Made.
customer_reviews.text: With first use found there was a bend in the pole of the umbrella which made it extremely difficult to close. The entire pole is crafted from thin plastic which lacked the strength to stand up to delivery much less any type of regular use.
customer_reviews.author: L.E.

customer_reviews.title: Mine broke on maiden voyage... :/
customer_reviews.text: I was saddened by this product. I shelled out more money to get a quality umbrella checked review and landed on this one.... only for it to break on me the first time I use it. The latching mechanism on mine broke so when you unstrap it, it flings open and isnt very easily opened or closed now. Bummer is, I had it for a few months before I had the chance to use it, so returning or exchanging was out. :/.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Holes way too soon
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I first purchased this umbrella. I bought it to keep myself and my kids dry as we walked to school, and it did great keeping four of us covered. However, after only owning the umbrella for nine months, with occasional use, not every day, and storage in a closet or trunk out of direct sunlight, there are already two holes in the canopy (pictures included). I don't think this is acceptable for an item I still consider to be new. So I gave it two stars.
customer_reviews.author: J shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not repel water well.
customer_reviews.text: I had used this umbrella about one week after receiving the umbrella for a bad rain storm and noticed that I was getting wet even under the umbrella. I brushed it off thinking it was due to the bad storm. Then I used it in just regular rain and for sure realized that this umbrella lets some water go through. It really does not repel the water. It is like the material is a bit porous letting some water molecules to go. The color is great but this umbrella is not worth the price. I last week bought an umbrella half the price at Costco and it works much better for what an umbrella is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: G4Free Customer Service is GREAT. Umbrella is HUGE and fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these back in February of 2019. After 9 months of typical use (nothing terribly hard) one of the tines underneath the umbrella broke. A small piece of plastic came apart and wouldn’t hold the tine in place. G4Free mentions a one year guarantee on their products and so I reached out to them. I sent them a picture of the issue and they are sending me a replacement umbrella. GREAT customer service and they stand by their products. Additionally, the umbrella is HUGE which is exactly what I wanted. It is a great umbrella to keep in the car when it is pouring rain outside. HIGHLY recommend the umbrella and G4Free.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: I got the middle sized one, and it is a good size. I am 6'2" and it is nice to find an umbrella that actually covers me. I haven't had it in heavy winds yet, but it has done well in light and moderate winds. Folds up nicely, and the carrying sleeve is handy. Quite long when folded, but with the carrying sleeve I can sling it over my back when walking.
customer_reviews.author: braingamer47

customer_reviews.title: Almost what I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: While be umbrella was the size I had hoped, it came with loose threading and a crusty residue at the tip. It was, however, very easy to request a return.
customer_reviews.author: Ame GillSP

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken but usable: Big umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. The tip of one the ribs was snapped off the rib. So this causes that end to pull up a bit. I didn't notice it until I used it the first time. It still works good and I haven't had any other problems. I bought it because I'm 6'1" and small umbrella usually end up with the back of my calves getting very wet in the rain. This one keeps me dry and another person can fit under it comfortably. When closed it's very long but I knew that going in. If it didn't arrive broken I'd be 5 star easy.
customer_reviews.author: Justifer

customer_reviews.title: support struts will snap with gust of wind
customer_reviews.text: overall looked nice, but real world conditions during rain and typical gusty conditions caused the umbrella to partially invert and snap one of the support struts. maybe this was a defective umbrella, but just be aware that this umbrella while affordable, seems to have a design flaw where air is not vented out of the top of the umbrella and will likely result in you getting soaked if you happen to be in a rain shower and a gust of wind blows by. do your due diligence and invest in something with better air vents and design.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Huge and Durable Self-opening Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is HUGE; one can easily protect 2 people from the rain. A button the the handle deploys the canopy (but does not retract it). The canopy is vented to prevent the umbrella's turning inside out on windy days. It comes with a form-fitting sheathe that has a carrying strap attached to facilitate carrying when not in active use. DO allow plenty of space about you when opening the umbrella to prevent poking a bystander. I'm extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Morgan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Best Umbrella EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: From the materials to the ease of use, this has been the best umbrella purchase ever! Just the small touches alone; like a cover with backstraps to hold the umbrella, to the ease of use with one hand; these and more make this the ultimate, and possibly last, purchase of an umbrella you will ever make. I bought the smaller size and it is big enough for myself and someone else. Don't delay, get yours today. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LoU_Da_MaN

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I live in florida so I need an umbrella now more the ever due to the rainy season. The strap on the holder of the umbrella has alrwady broken and when is rains hard water comes down the pole. The more upsetting part is there are no holes in the thing which leads me to believe the water is going threw the fabric itself. The only thing I can say for sure is there are defiantly no holes in it. Its a little disappointing, but it works fine if theres a drizzle
customer_reviews.author: PinkTweet

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a durable umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I like this umbrella so far. All of the components are more hefty than I've seen with the typical golf umbrellas I've bought in the past. I expect it to last a while because of that. I bought the 54" option and am happy with the size. It should serve its purpose on the golf course but at the same time not be obnoxiously big if I want to use it around town or in the city. The trade-off for buying a sturdy umbrella is that it's a bit heavier than typical umbrellas, but I don't find the slight additional weight to be a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan C.

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't work when there is moderate to high wind
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work when there is moderate to high wind. It doesn't vent the air out through the top canopy as advertised. it repeatedly inverted the whole canopy in moderate wind. The top canopy is too tightly sits on the larger bottom canopy. Consequently, the wind load cannot create pathway to escape through the top. It is very difficult to mange in moderate wind. I have say it is badly designed. However, it is sturdy and I could push the canopy back to its normal configuration without breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Cy Zaman

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking umbrella with worst performance
customer_reviews.text: Bought this umbrella back in 2018, sadly it broke during a light windy/rain event in New York. I contacted customer service and was advised a replacement was being shipped. I am still waiting for that said replacement today October 2019. If you're buying this umbrella for sun protection, it is a great buy. However, don't expect this umbrella to survive any rain with wind gust over 20 miles per hour.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer games!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after sitting in the direct sun in 100 degree heat one Saturday afternoon. It was horrific. Plus I wasn't able to keep my son under my typical rain umbrella with me. I used this & I was able to comfortably cover my younger son & myself, as we sat in chairs. It was fantastic & I was so much more comfortable. It went up easily & collapsed easily. It comes with a bag with a carry handle, but we threw it in our wagon. This was money very well spent!
customer_reviews.author: ravenchow

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and geta the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Great material. Sturdy. Huge. Does the job! My son does outdoor archery and last season was terrible. Rained every competition he had. Helped keep us and his equipment dry! Ordered another for my husband who is a teacher and helps in the pickup and drop off line getting kids in and out of cars. He forgot it one day and had to use someone else's umbrella. Let's just say he hasn't done that again haha!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - Very Cheaply Made Umbrella That will Break Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I owned this umbrella for a couple months and only used it a few times and two of the ribs / frame broke already. They are made of a very weak and flimsy plastic and once they snap, there is no way to fix them or repair them. The umbrella itself is very light weight and poorly made. If you saw this in a store, you would not buy it so do not be tempted to buy it online sight unseen despite the cheap price. You get what you pay for, or less than what you paid for in this case, so avoid this umbrella and find something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: David Sean McClintock

customer_reviews.title: Average.
customer_reviews.text: Strong quality which is amazing. However, the length of it is makes it feel at a weird angle when you hold it over your shoulder. ALSO, on the third use a small part of the part to click or down chipped and now the whole thing won’t close at all! Sucks to have such a large umbrella that won’t even close!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Michelle F. Gortayo

customer_reviews.title: HUGE... and i like them huge
customer_reviews.text: So... this feels like I'm walking around the block with a table umbrella... it's that big... and I LOVE IT... a big umbrella is what you need - to ensure you don't get wet... who needs a tiny umbrella? seriously - you just wind up getting wet in the front or the back... you can not get full coverage from a small umbrella... that is why a HUGE umbrella is helpful... get one today... stay dry my friend... unless you like being wet - then get yourself a tiny umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: like me, please

customer_reviews.title: Great size, like the strap for carrying, sometimes water drips in
customer_reviews.text: A couple times, after I have gone inside from the rain and collapsed the umbrella and let it sit upright (like it does in an umbrella holder), when I go back out, the handle and inside of the umbrella are quite wet. I guess water had dripped down because the layers in the umbrella have gaps to allow (I think) for air flow in wind. It's not the best/perfect umbrella for me, but the size and strap for carrying made me keep it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Rain rain go away.
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! I bought the largest umbrella I could find. My last one broke in high winds and I decided my next one would be huge because I was tired of half my body not covered and wet I found this product on a lightening round. When it arrived I opened it up and was impressed. I have had it for a few weeks and am patiently waiting for it to rain. Haven't used it yet but know I will be happy and dry when it does.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: broke on a windy day
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one I have ordered, my last one broke on a windy day we had needless to say I'm disappointed with that happening. Let's see how long this one will last me. Update: It's raining and water is dripping on my head and looks like I'll have to order from someone else, DISSATISFIED
customer_reviews.author: Bavaria

customer_reviews.title: Huuuge
customer_reviews.text: This is the largest umbrella I’ve had. I can fit my family of four under it. I haven’t had a chance to take it in the wind yet but from pushing and bending the support structure I’m confident that it will hold up very well in high winds. Another thing that I love about it is the sling. It will be great to carry it around on my back all day when rain is expected. If I had to complain about anything I’d appreciate a nicer handle. This umbrella’s is a firm but comfortable foam. It’s just fine but I’m unsure about it’s long term durability. All in all a great umbrella and we are ordering another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Photostar7980

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: So when I used this for the first time it was great. It's not supposed to flip inside out and it didn't. Instead I thought I might have to let go of it if it gets to windy because I thought it was going to pick me up and carry me over Lake Erie to Canada LoL
customer_reviews.author: Irish dancer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent umbrella that meets all my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I use this umbrella mostly to stay out of the sun. I Autocross and walking the course for an hour in the heat is untenable. This umbrella provides excellent coverage and is easy to operate. The carrying case makes totting the umbrella a snap and the handle is comfortable and easy to hold. For those of you interested in a more standard rain application, I'm sure this will stand up to almost any downpour and leave you dry. The 54" is big enough for two folks without being claustrophobic. Of course, if you're looking for a compact, this isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I bought this type of umbrella was for the top part that has slits in it to allow the wind to pass through, it's so your umbrella doesn't fly away. And for an umbrella of this size you really need that. Unfortunately no wind can pass through the slits because they are too tight against the other part of the fabric. This morning it was barley windy but it felt like the umbrella was floating.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Using it for my bike
customer_reviews.text: Very solid umbrella, big, heavy-wind proof and good look ! I like its design, however the handle bar and the auto-open system could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Shujian Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Falling apart after a couple months of use. It leaks, the strap on the sheath fell off, the cap at the top of the umbrella fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, No Grip
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella seems great quality, but it is extremely heavy and hard to keep a decent grip on. The handle doesn't have enough friction, nor a decent shape. As well, the tip is VERY smooth... making it impossible to stand/angle anywhere because it'll just slip and fall onto the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: Best large umbrella I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is the umbrella of my dreams. After purchasing several "golf-sized" jumbo umbrellas that fell apart almost immediately, this umbrella has come to save the day. First, the size is SUPER big - like, it comes with a carrying sleeve, and one person thought I was actually carrying a rifle in it. LOL. Second, the opening and closing mechanism is SUPER solid and quite amazing. This thing feels like it will last a long time. Lastly, this umbrella was able to protect me and several others in rain and wind that was quite heavy. I'll be forever impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetry Guy

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Just received, but every impression is positive. I like that there's no big logo plastered across, like with most name brand golf umbrellas. Nearly exactly matches the size of the golf umbrella it replaces (due to non-functioning open button). Handle has foam feel and is relatively large -- feels good to adult hand. Comes in a nice outer, removable outer sleeve with strap to hang over shoulder. Just seems like good goods all around.
customer_reviews.author: M. White

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight in the hand, easy to open and close
customer_reviews.text: 62 inch umbrella is lightweight in the hand, compared to the umbrella it is replacing. Time will tell if it will be as durable as the one it is replacing, which lasted 20 years. It's easy to open and close, and it comes with a sleeve that has a carry strap so that I can carry on my shoulder when rain threatens.
customer_reviews.author: M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to how big this is
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to buy a new golf umbrella and thought "bigger is better, right?"... so I selected the largest option without double-checking anything. When it arrived I discovered just how big it was! It was as long as my driver!! My golf bag has a set of umbrella-holding loops, and this would have fit in those... but it was so long that it just wasn't going to work. I had to return it and now I plan to purchase the smallest option. So my advice to you is to measure before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Rhinehart

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Worst umbrella I've ever owned all plastic cracks very easily and then stopped closing.
customer_reviews.author: panda

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me very dry
customer_reviews.text: Got this for some rainy texas days walking to & from class at school! When the wind is blowing & rain is pouring it holds up great! Kept me dry as a bone today. Couldn't ask for it to be better. Seems pretty high quality. No issues opening up & pole material seems to have carbon fiber (although it just looks like it) on the inside. Handle is comfortable & it's not heavy in the slightest. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Luke B.

customer_reviews.title: Well Packaged; Fun to Unwrap.
customer_reviews.text: Easy, Smooth opening, but hold it Up and Away, that 68 incher will try to slap you in the face. Looks Big enuf to keep you dry in a hard rain. Feels light but very sturdy. And love the sound when the lock Snaps closed. Indicates Quality. You could put a rubber tip on it and have a cane. Check out the tiny screw that secures the large tip. Use it as a weapon, a bat, a club, a spear. Just kidding. At 30 bucks, it's a steal. We're going for a walk ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: WVU Alumnus in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Someone you love will steal your umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Oklahoma wind-proof, nicely proportioned, tidy design, sturdy as heck, and the carbon-fiber handle is GORGEOUS. Notes on operation: -one-touch button works well, smooth opening, not clattery or loose. -the spokes and joints are tightly assembled, doesn't grab my hair -closing is a little tough, the mechanism is robust Takes two hands. -upper canopy tier has a separate closure, make sure to open both before opening the umbrella Overall, this umbrella is classy, effective and a breeze to operate, the carrying sleeve is also a beautiful detail. I'm getting another for the hubby.
customer_reviews.author: Perkyshai

customer_reviews.title: Most durable umbrella I've ever seen/held/used!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella after having my previous two absolutely obliterated by strong Ohio winds. I've not taken this umbrella outside in high wind yet as I've only recently received it, but seeing the sturdy construction, and feeling how heavy it is (not THAT heavy, but certainly heavy enough to indicate it's built to last), I honestly can't fathom a situation aside from walking outside in hurricane winds that could destroy this umbrella. Thanks a lot for the product. I'm actually looking forward to taking this outside on a high wind/pouring rain day to show it off a bit. Side note: This arrived on my doorstep just two days after I placed my order!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Manak

customer_reviews.title: good umbrella, but too big for cars
customer_reviews.text: First off this is great a umbrella... just not for everything. It’s very big and makes getting in and out of a vehicle very difficult. As far as rain protection goes, it’s supurb, but probably more we’ll suited for longer excursions like walking your dog in the rain, public transpo, etc. if you are looking for something just to keep you dry between trips to you car then I’d say this is too big and you should look for something more collapsible
customer_reviews.author: Remi Vocali

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I used this umbrella a few times in pretty decent rain storms and was happy with the width, weight, comfort and look. The weight was nice because it felt sturdy but light enough for anyone to use. I encountered an issue with something I didn’t list above and what I can say is I received great customer service. I didn’t ask or expect a rep to reach out to me from the company but they did. I would recommend this because they stand by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: This is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of large umbrellas that keep me and my feet dry in heavy rain. I have a small umbrella that can do that very well while I'm walking alone. I brought this with my wife in mind. It's large enough to keep both of us dry while we're walking together. In mild wind and heavy rain, this will do the job. In fast winds, are you kidding? One can hold on with two hands at the right angle, but any umbrella will fail if the wind is too high. I recommend this as a second umbrella for the conditions and purposes stated above.
customer_reviews.author: S. Prince

customer_reviews.title: Ordered several; one came broken
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Seller saw my original review and promptly corrected the problem, replacing the broken item. No complaints. Good umbrella and reasonable price. Original review: I ordered several. Generally, the umbrellas are good for the price. One, though, came missing pieces that attach the rode to head. Not a shipping problem, but manufacturing issue. Since I ordered several, I didn't immediately test them all. I tried to return but 3 days too late.
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Nobile

customer_reviews.title: OK umbrella that does not stand up to high wind
customer_reviews.text: Apparently “Virtually Windproof” as they advertise does NOT mean Actually Windproof. This is a good and large non folding umbrella but in severe storms and high wind it will invert and then you get wet while fighting to get it back into the correct shape. It doesn’t break it just inverts too easily. The double canopy in this umbrella just doesn’t really work that well.
customer_reviews.author: Shmooty

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I am the recipient of either a defective product or a simply poorly made one. I purchased this umbrella because of all the great reviews. I have had this for just over a month (3 days past the return date) and one of the tops of the umbrella has just detached today. Overall I like the umbrella so I'm hoping it's simply a defective one. I'm also hoping the company will still replace. Update (3/13/17): The company sent me out a (new) replacement umbrella (about a month ago), due to the first one being defective. They were very nice and provided great customer service. So far the replacement hasn't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Huey

customer_reviews.title: G4 68 in golf umbrella
customer_reviews.text: pretty color mauve feels strong and is big and shipping was great in a long cardboard BUT whomever put it in the box FAILED to see a HOLE at the END of one of the spikes. A hole like there was insects in their storage area. THIS WILL NOT HOLD UP LONG WITH A HOLE IN IT. I AM BUYING A PATCH KIT. So that is why the 4. The product is as listed,
customer_reviews.author: kspol

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Extremely elegant umbrella. I get compliments on it from total strangers on the street, I think mostly because I got the largest size, which is huge. I live in Chicago, however, and if you want to stay dry in this rain, you need the widest cover you can get. The only issue when it's this large is that the stem is extremely long, so it ends up being most practical to hold it several inches above the handle, which isn't ideal. Hardly a big issue though. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: thisisanaccount

customer_reviews.title: Works well under normal conditions, but did not hold up to claims under heavy rain/wind.
customer_reviews.text: A steady breeze is common in New England, and this umbrella is great for light rain. Unfortunately, I wouldn't call this umbrella "windproof." It can be easily assembled after becoming tangled from a moderate storm, but if it's really coming down with heavy winds the snap the innards of the umbrella like a twig. If you are from a windy area, this is great for a light drizzle. But don't expect it to hold up under reasonable winds. Note: I trashed the broken umbrellas and just bought new ones when the wind damage made repairs impossible. I can't speak to the money back guarantee claim.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella > grip strength required
customer_reviews.text: We are moving to the rainy UK so I wanted a large umbrella that can handle the wind. This umbrella is perfect. (We got the hunter green color and it is lovely). I have reduced grip strength in my hands due to carpal tunnel and arthritis, so with a very large canopy and a long, straight handle, I did have some trouble balancing the umbrella on a windy day. It would be helpful to have a curved or more ergonomic handle. Otherwise, really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: not just for golf
customer_reviews.text: I'm in a wheelchair and this is just the right size to keep my ever-so-fluffy person and chair dry, it fits into a cane holder which is handy. I had it out in heavy rain and moderate wind, the trees were pretty frisky and it handled fine. It is easy to open and close, and comes with a bag with strap long enough to go over shoulder. I'm going to give it the benefit of doubt for durability and since it looks well made and dried fast I give it a 5
customer_reviews.author: cathleen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Dry
customer_reviews.text: So, I am 34 and never purchased and umbrella. I just kind of always had one somehow. My husband broke my LARGE umbrella and I needed a replacement. I got this one, the color is great, and I used it here in a our Houston weather. It was lightweight but comfortable and easy to carry. I love the little cover it comes with, frees my hands without leaving my umbrella behind.
customer_reviews.author: Nancikynz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent overall product !!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I like the larger umbrellas so this was perfect, the vented feature works great to keep the umbrella from flipping inside out during high winds. The size again was great keeps my whole upper body with a backpack covered from the rain and elements. Pros: Extra Large size great to keep your upper body and a backpack covered from the elements Vented top portion to keep the wind from deforming the umbrella 2 Velcro straps, when the umbrella is folded up these keep the umbrella closed up Cons: The button to open the umbrella, I find myself accidently depressing when not needed (the button Placement could be better)
customer_reviews.author: Lance McLean

customer_reviews.title: If you're thinking about it...
customer_reviews.text: Do it! Order this guy! I did endless research of comparing, contemplating, blah blah blah...let me save you some time - just get it. The durability is impeccable, the coverage is stellar and the ease of it all gets one hundred percent 5-stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy STop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: 68 inch is the largest carrying umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure from the photos if 68 inches is any larger than regular giant umbrellas at regular stores. It is larger. Exactly as I'd hoped. Still so easy to carry, i had to double check reflection to make sure it is much larger. It actually keeps the rain and wind off me and my backpack. Wish Id had one of these years ago. An accidental extra cool thing is that we are Boycotting Israel and especially its most giant prison company calked "g4s." The small logo tags say "G4 free." Double Yay! Happy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Massive
customer_reviews.text: Well made and stirdy, be warned though, I go the 68" model on sale while the smaller ones were more expensive so I gave it a shot. It is massive! It wont even fit sideways across the trunk of a sedan massive. Taller than some people I know massive. You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael I

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's a push button, easy to operate, has the double layer top to keep the wind from inverting it. Also has a shoulder strap for hands-free carrying. Seems to be well made, which is a relief because it was such a bargain that I was worried it would be cheap Chinese garbage. Love the color. Would buy another if I needed it. I recently bought a "Bag Boy" brand similar golf umbrella, which I am also very pleased with, but this one is better due to the push button and strap plus it's less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: S. Forest

customer_reviews.title: High quality well designed umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The material appears to be very waterproof as it held up very well and shed almost all the water on it after collapsing and with a quick shake. The hand grip is firm but soft and the release button easy to push to extend. Just be sure you have a lot of open space in front of you as it opens to a much larger area than I thought it would. Nice carrying case included with a strap that makes it easy to carry on your shoulder. Very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: davenesf

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't stop laughing ! With Joy.
customer_reviews.text: Not a drop of rain on me. Winds kinda worried me, glad I'm a big guy. Just short of a beach umbrella but works well. I see two reasons it is preferred by the golfing community. Can fit the golfer and caddy easily under the generous span. Misses are metal construction underneath. Might want to use carbon fiber and would lessen the chances of golfers getting struct by lightning in a summers storm !
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Best Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best umbrella I’ve ever used. Not only do I never get wet when it rains anymore but this can easily fit two people under it even though I’m curvy. I’ve used this in heavy rain and when it was windy and haven’t had any problems. This umbrella is super water resistant and a few shakes of it will get all the rain off it. A huge plus for me was the umbrella case that comes with it that can be used to carry over your shoulder for convenience. Overall, I would highly recommend this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: SpiritDrayn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a few months of very light and occasional use. Sturdy but with a cheap plastic clip to hold closed which failed for no good reason. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Not a good umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is way too heavy. Also the handle is so difficult to grasp. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, high quality umbrella. Love the foam handle and the umbrella itself is rather light and quite stylish coming out of the subway in a downpour. I've made quite a few friends with this as it will easily cover three people in the rain. No other complaints or cons- its a great umbrella- it keeps me and my friends dry- not much more to be said.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice features for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the mechanism that holds the umbrella closed. It seems well made as compared to umbrellas that have that spring loaded half moon piece of metal that snaps into a slot. The slot around the metal wears out and the umbrella doesn't stay open . This umbrella is not like that you depress the button that releases the umbrella and the spring opens the umbrella . So far I am pleased with the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Losten Deforest

customer_reviews.title: Great size, but not durable.  Broke after only 2 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Great size umbrella and looks fantastic. However, one of the "spokes" broke on only the 2nd time being used. It should not snap so easily when it was being used like any normal umbrella...it wasn't even windy. Very disappointed in the durability of an umbrella that is supposed to withstand strong winds, etc. How can an umbrella break so easily?
customer_reviews.author: DLEE

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Product
customer_reviews.text: Well I was a fan at first sight. The umbrella it's nice looking and large, easy to use. However, I was out walking my dog and using the umbrella because it was raining. It was slightly windy and the umbrella easily bent on one side and tore in 3 spots. I wasn't out in a storm...the damage to the umbrella is due to cheap quality products. I'm very disappointed in this product and do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Junk Umbrella Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Rarely write a review. I paid the premium for this umbrella assuming it would last. Used this umbrella twice in light conditions. Then one of the ribs broke. I emailed customer service through their email and Amazon. They haven't responded after 3 attempts. They say there is a one year warranty but good luck having them respond to you. Save yourself some money and buy the $15 to $20 versions.
customer_reviews.author: Go Terps

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - but 68” is SO BIG!
customer_reviews.text: The umber is in really good quality, but a 68’’ is just TOO BIG for me. I feel it would look weird to carry such a giant umbrella to walk on the street. It covers me(5’4’’) and my boyfriend(6’) easily, and I believe it is able cover up to four adults. I’m gonna return this and get the 62’’. But if you are looking for an over-oversized, good-quality umbrella, the 68’’ one would be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: It works great until it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Its a sturdy umbrella but if its super windy (push you over windy) it may snap. Obviously if its that windy you might think to close the umbrella and just get wet since youre gonna get soaked anyways. Well, if this umbrella has strong wind pushing it, it will not close. Period. It doesn't matter how you angle the thing in the wind. It won't close until the wind slows down. Hopefully it doesn't snap before then (like mine did. I really liked this umbrella. I bought it twice). Hopefully their guarantee works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge umbrella, pretty hunter green color, too heavy, grip issues
customer_reviews.text: The hunter green color is just gorgeous and the big size (62) was great. However, this is just too heavy to carry (for me, petite) and the grip was not ergonomic for me, in that it did not help offset the top-heavy weight of the umbrella. I can imagine many would really love the handle (almost feels like neoprene) but for me, I couldn't quite get a good grip. Also it was hard to close. I am so glad this worked out for so many people, I am going to try another brand. Thank you to Amazon for easy return process. I hope we all have sunshine days ahead :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The umbrella to keep your umbrella dry
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is huge and feels extremely well built. I live in Chicago and haven't had any concerns with it's durability after two months. To give you an idea on the size I am 6'3" about 200lbs, and can sit under the umbrella with it just proped on the handle. I think a size smaller would be better for golf, but this is perfect for the beach or if you mostly ride carts.
customer_reviews.author: You can call me Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sexy, smooth, and dry.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is sexy, smooth to open, and feels sturdy. There’s a little weight to it but it looks, works, and serves its purpose so well that I think it’s worth it. My main purpose with the size was to avoid my shoes and lower pants getting wet on the way to work. It almost gets the job done completely minus any windy rain. Probably could go a size up if you really want but this one definitely is working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If only it would have lasted longer...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this umbrella for a year and it no longer latches when I close it. I live in Colorado and it almost never rains so in the last year I might have opened it 10 times so for it to break with such little use seems pretty bad to me. I would not buy this umbrella again. I'd rather pay more for a quality product. 6/21/18 Update: The manufacturer contacted me and replaced the broken umbrella so I've updated my review to 4 stars as they stand behind their product. I was happy with the umbrella and just disappointed when it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

product_meta.title: G4Free 54/62/68 Inch Automatic Open Golf Umbrella Extra Large Oversize Double Canopy Vented Windproof Waterproof Stick Umbrellas
feature_bullets: THE ULTIMATE GOLF UMBRELLA With a 54/62/68-inch canopy and heavy duty design, the G4Free Ultimate Golf Umbrella is an ideal companion for golfers, the business professional or for daily life. With its sleek all black design, comfortable EVA grip, sturdy frame and auto open mechanism, the G4Free Ultimate Golf Umbrella is perfect in a metropolitan city or a sports field!

PROTECTS FROM THE ELEMENTS Never get caught in the rain (or sun) again. The G4Free Ultimate Golf Umbrella will protect you from anything that mother nature can throw at you; rain, hail or shine. The canopy uses ultra water resistant 210T pongee fabric. This silk derived material is lightweight, and water resistant with SPF 50+ protection.

YOU (WON'T) BE BLOWN AWAY The double-canopy design and fiberglasses frame will ensure that your umbrella is VIRTUALLY WINDPROOF. Wind will simply not break it. The double-canopy design creates a vent during where wind can pass through, making the umbrella much easier to handle in harsh conditions.
OPENS FAST Automatic Open functionality ensures that there will be no delay to your comfort. Fast and reliable automatic opening function. Simply press the button on the handle to open.

ONE YEAR GUARANTEE. We engineer our umbrellas to stand the test of time. For the ribs and tips we use fiberglass, which is flexible and durable. The canopy is created using chain stitching with nine stitches per inch. We stand behind the durability of our goods and offer an unconditional guarantee against any defects in craftsmanship.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
